# The exif extension

Configure the `exif` extension.

This extension provides support for working with exchangeable image metadata.

## PHP_EXT_EXIF

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## PHP_EXT_EXIF_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
